question: Which of the following are the only tennis players in history with four Olympic gold medals, as well as the only ones to win Olympic gold in the same event on three separate occasions?
option1: Kathleen Mckane Godfree and Venus Williams
option2: Kathleen Mckane Godfree and Serena Williams
option4: Gigi Fernandez and Mary Joe Fernandez
explanation: Venus Williams and Serena Williams are the only tennis players in history with four Olympic gold medals, as well as the only ones to win Olympic gold in the same event on three separate occasions.
